title: AWESOME, two bedroom condo
posting_body: Large two bedroom condo with heat and hot water included.
This small building of five condominiums is located in the Pratville neighborhood of Chelsea, on the Everett Chelsea line.
It is on Woodlawn Avenue, a residential street of single family homes, that is located between Everett’s Elm Street and Chelsea’s Washington Avenue.
Both main streets have nearby bus stops.
#110 bus route goes to the Orange Line at Wellington, or the Blue Line at Wonderland.
The building has convenient off street parking, only steps from the front door.
You won’t need a shovel snow as prompt snow removal is provided by the association.
There is coin operated laundry equipment for your convenience in the lower level laundry room.
Each apartment is heated with baseboard heat that is individually controlled within each condominium.
Heat and hot water is included in your rent.
This well maintained condominium property has a few apartment homes that are available for rent.
They are one and two bedroom sizes.
Please check our website for current availability.
Condominiums and the condominium association are professionally managed by Mastrocola Management, Inc..
